seo.title: Aditya Raj - Full Stack Developer Portfolio
seo.description: Full Stack Developer with 2+ years of experience in Angular, .NET, and cloud-native applications
seo.keywords: full stack developer, angular, .net, microservices, azure, portfolio, software engineer
seo.author: Aditya Raj

paragraphs: Full Stack Developer with 2+ years of experience building scalable web applications using Angular and .NET. I specialize in developing RESTful APIs, integrating GraphQL with Angular, implementing microservice architectures, and deploying applications via Azure CI/CD pipelines.

Known for rapid learning, effective client communication, and strong collaboration in agile environments. I'm passionate about cloud-native and data-driven application development, always eager to tackle complex problems and deliver innovative solutions that drive business value.

items.name: TalkTalk NSJ Migration
description: Developed and deployed 8+ microservice-based APIs using .NET Core
Reduced system response time by 10% while supporting 10,000+ concurrent users
Implemented across 3 major product releases with 99% sprint commitment success
Integrated with Azure CI/CD pipelines for automated deployment and scaling

items.name: Online Disease Detection System
description: Developed a web application using Python Django framework for disease prediction
Built responsive front-end with HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap for optimal user experience
Implemented machine learning algorithms to analyze user parameters and predict diseases
Demonstrated strong project management skills including time management and teamwork

responsibilities: Developed and deployed 8+ microservice-based APIs using .NET, reducing system response time by 10% and supporting 10,000+ concurrent users across 3 major product releases
Built 15+ dynamic and responsive UI components using Angular, improving user engagement by 25% and decreasing page load times by 35%
Participated in daily stand-ups for 8-person cross-functional Agile team, completed 99% of sprint commitments on time, and delivered 12+ client-requested features across 8 two-week sprints
Collaborated directly with stakeholders to gather requirements and implemented solutions that reduced client-reported issues by 60% and increased customer satisfaction scores by 30%

Implemented Google Analytics tracking specifications across 12+ touch-points in the customer sales journey, providing data-driven insights that enabled client to optimize product offerings and increase conversion rates by 20%

categories.name: Education
items: B.Tech Computer Science, Vel Tech Institute of Science and Technology (GPA: 8.33/10, July 2018 - July 2022)
